visual_markers: Notice of Violation (NOV) number on ticket
City of Phoenix or Phoenix Municipal Court branding
citation_patterns.notes: City parking citations are printed on a Notice of Violation left on the windshield with payment envelope and instructions for entering a plea. Citation numbers appear as eight‑digit numbers; precise pattern is unconfirmed.

phone_confirmation_policy.confirmation_message: Call Phoenix Municipal Court / City Services to confirm the correct mailing address for appeals.
Call Phoenix Municipal Court / City Services to confirm the correct mailing address for appeals.

verification_metadata.notes: City’s parking violation page explains that vehicles with unpaid complaints may be booted and that payment or arrangements must be made at the Phoenix Municipal Court; it lists 300 West Washington Street and provides the court phone number for questions.

_original_official_confirmation.purpose: Confirm Phase‑1 appeal mailing address and routing for City of Phoenix parking citations.
